name: BIA - Bozen-Bolzano Institutional Archive
description: The Bozen-Bolzano Institutional Archive (BIA) gathers the research outcomes of the community of researchers of the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano (unibz), EURAC Research and Laimburg Research Centre. It serves as a platform for the dissemination of research outputs, provides centralized access, increases visibility, and allows full-text search when available. BIA is managed by the Library of the Free University of Bozen-Bolzano.
owner_name: Free University of Bozen-Bolzano (unibz), EURAC Research, Laimburg Research Centre
owner_website: https://bia.unibz.it; https://www.unibz.it; https://www.eurac.edu; (Laimburg Research Centre website not provided in sources)
